channel.title: Comments on: The Electoral Hawa
channel.description: Critical Collaboration on the Middle East, South Asia, and Africa

item.title: By: Sahil Mehendiratta
item.dc:creator: Sahil Mehendiratta
item.description: Nice article, but this "hawa" seems to have failed in case of recent Delhi elections, might be this hawa scenario is changing and people have started thinking in a different or practical way. It is still a long way to get away with this hawa scenario for rest of the India.
item.content:encoded: Nice article, but this “hawa” seems to have failed in case of recent Delhi elections, might be this hawa scenario is changing and people have started thinking in a different or practical way. It is still a long way to get away with this hawa scenario for rest of the India.
